name: Santa Match!
description:
Santa Match is a great fun game for kids where they have to Match the santa's

When you do get a pair you hear Santa saying a series of phrases like "Well Done" & "ohh that's great" and many more

Voiced by: VoiceoverGuy.co.uk

Produced by : VoiceoverGuy.co.uk & SlinkyApps.com

Works on all devices 4.0 and above and it's also full screen on an iPad, and supports iOS 5
